titleStmt.title: A True Relation of the rise and progress of the East India Company, shewing how their manufactures have been, are, and will be prejudicial, to the manufactures of England; and what endeavours have been used for and against any restriction. Together with some remarks thereon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by A. Baldwin in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
